title: Slow hole diffusion limits the efficiency of p-type dye-sensitized solar cells based on the P1 dye
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00271G, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Maria B. Brands, Olivier C. M. Lugier, Kaijian Zhu, Annemarie Huijser, Stefania Tanase, Joost N. H. Reek
The performance of NiO as p-type semiconducting material in DSSC's suffers from excessive charge recombination, limiting the overall efficiency. Here we study the origin of the phenomenon, indicating that slow hole diffusion is the main cause.
